trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Plymouth
There were no other sightings in Plymouth on or around July 4th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were in Plymouth waiting for the fireworks to begin when we saw the orange orb move across the sky. It did not blink or flash, did not stop, and moved at a consistent speed. About 15 minutes later we saw it again, moving in the same direction, what appeared to be the same speed, etc... as far as we could tell it was indentical in behavior. We only saw it those two times, both times it came into view and left without stopping. We heard no sound from it. It behaved exactly like a plane in the sky would have, minus the fact it was not a plane. We did snap a photo of it, although all you can see is just an orange ball. Hardly anything conclussive.
Summary: Orange orb moving in a straight line
